titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for reformation of the many abuses committed against the Corporation of Gardners.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: VVhitehall this third day of December, in the tenth yeere of Our Reigne. ...

Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
